extendedInfo.description: Get instant access to your ESC service dispatches in the field. See detailed customer data, track and modify jobs and hours, invoice and capture payments all while providing real-time updates to office personnel. ESC Mobile works with your ESC desktop software to give you instant access to your service dispatches on your phone. You can try this app even if you do not currently have ESC in the office. ESC Mobile is a simple and affordable way to outfit your field techs with real-time job information and time tracking. With ESC Mobile, service techs are able to see the information pertaining to their dispatches, and supervisors can manage other techâs work.  Get ESC Mobile on your phone to: - Spend less time calling the office to give and get job updates - Access critical work-order information - Create/manage dispatches for yourself and other techs with management features- See detailed customer, location, equipment and service agreement information - Get detailed driving directions to your customerâs location - Track traveling to and working time with real-time status updates - Attach photos to dispatches to create a record of work completed- View files attached to the customer or dispatch- Build invoices/quotes and process payments in the field- Email invoices/quotes to customers- Swipe credit card payments with Merchant Warehouse- Capture customer signatures- Add/edit customer equipmentESC Service Software, developed by dESCO, is the tool of choice by over 5,000 HVAC, Plumbing, Electrical, Equipment, and other service contractors. From service calls, technician scheduling, service contract management, to inventory and equipment tracking ESC streamlines the entire workflow through one comprehensive solution.To learn more, please visit http:// desco-soft.comESC Mobile app is only compatible with Android 2.1 or higher.

reviews.title: Almost Useless
reviews.comment: Has to have a data connection to work. Cannot use on WiFi when I\'m at our shop. Cannot attach documents/pictures of customer hardware. Very rarely works... I wish our company didn\'t use this software.
reviews.author: Chris Hoffman

reviews.title: Sluggish
reviews.comment: Every time I click \"back\" from a job it loads for quite a while.  It\'s not downloading my list of jobs, though.  If I want to see any changes, I then need to refresh.  It is super slow for the amount of information it handles.  If you need to look at a different screen when you don\'t have data or -if you can imagine it- on the phone, you\'re in trouble.
reviews.author: Owen Sharp

reviews.title: Connecting.......
reviews.comment: Instead of storing svc calls locally until completed it wants to refresh everytime you click on anything. And if you lose data connectivity you cant access the list of calls on the phone and the tech has to either drive around looking for signal or call the office to get the information. Too expensive for what it offers. Also, will attach pictures from camera only, you cant upload from file. Big minus.
reviews.author: Villa Gesell

reviews.title: Does the job, but needs local abilities.
reviews.comment: I really hope that v.13 gets improved. Having to always have a data signal is ridiculous. I would like to be able to access my price book at all times. I have been using your software for over 5 yrs, & up until you went to the web style (v.11?) I always could. I could always see what was on board the last time I had synced, I may not have seen any new additions. But at least see what had been downloaded. Now lose data, click on new tab & loose everything. Yes I would expect my pc to work without a network.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Payment options
reviews.comment: Doesnt accurately track inventory and wont allow you to enter more than 1 of each kind of payment. I.E. 2 different credit cards. Good idea, but poor execution. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap!!!
reviews.comment: Pure out and out garbage i pay money for this ? Word to everyone ....do not use this program!!!!!
reviews.author: Matthew Murphy

reviews.title: Android version
reviews.comment: Is it just the Android apps that are having the signatures failures. Or is Apple having the same issues?
reviews.author: chad mcnabb

reviews.comment: It is great! So much better than paper.
reviews.author: Eric Rausin

reviews.title: There is so much more than just the app.
reviews.comment: This is a big program that\'s not just the mobile app.  Pros: totally syncs w/ Quickbooks, good customer service & support, has the ability to process credit cards from the software/app (if you use MerchantWarehouse who did save us $) once everything is set up it\'s a good program (not great, just good).  Cons: It\'s expensive, takes a while to get set up, has A LOT of idiosyncrasies in the software, the app side isn\'t as full function as the desktop side, doesn\'t automatically alert tech that they have a new dispatch.  I would say this software is good for a small-ish service company that already has some things in place like Quickbooks but needs a better dispatching & mobile invoicing option. I suggest it but only to people that can take the time to learn a whole new system almost on their own. Ya there is training provided, but I didn\'t feel that it was very through.  I worked with the system till I found a road block then called support & asked my specific question. I consider myself very tech savvy, & it still took a while to learn. We\'ve had the system for 3 months & there are still things I don\'t know how to do or have fully set up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I Think it\'s a Great Program!
reviews.comment: My Company has been using this ESC mobile program since its inception. Sure we\'ve had our issues with it but most of those issues were from not fully understanding the program or its capability\'s. One of the most important things is to have a real good cell phone provider that can provide good quality data service. Not just phone service but DATA service! We did much research on this when we made the change to mobile and by far Verizon had the best service in our area of Northeast PA. This App has streamlined our operation and I am sure the folks at ESC will make it even better!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Electrical Service Company
reviews.comment: The mobile software is great for using Google maps to find your way to appointments. Ummmm well that\'s it! Version 13 for the laptop needs to have the ability to display quotes for the customer and have them sign at bottom. Then you should also be able to convert the quote into an invoice on the spot. This should all happen without internet connection.  The desktop software you cant even detach the calendar, so you can talk to the customer about scheduling as your setting up their dispatch.  One other thing that sucks about ESC is the fact you can\'t create non inventory parts to make sure your parts pricing can get updated. Which in turn can update your price books.  I will stop here or I will go on all day with things that are lacking in ESC mobile and desktop software.  This software is not worth the money at this point.
reviews.author: Stuart Minogue

reviews.title: Only thing worse than the product is the support.
reviews.comment: This is absolutely the worst service software I have ever seen. I cannot tell you how many times I\'ve had to troubleshoot instead of desco support. Its always some excuse with them as to why its the clients fault.  Stay away from desco.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus 7 & Windows phone 7
reviews.comment: We have started using this product now for two months. Install went great, Tech support has been top notch have returned calls within the hour.  The desktop software and the App has worked great no problems. We imported all of our customers from peach tree.  We have started adding inventory into ESC and it pulls all the info over to peach tree.  The expectation that this app should work without network connection is crazy.  If your PC wasn\'t connected to your network would you expect it to work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what I was told it does
reviews.comment: Works great for time track & quotes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Saves me time
reviews.comment: Time is money
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lame
reviews.comment: My life is sad because of this app. I used to love my phone, but now I hate it. I have to re install app everyday just to catch signitures. Lame lame lame
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Arghhh!
reviews.comment: Won\'t capture signatures any more so we have to capture one on paper form created to accomodate the app because without signature, we can\'t take them to small claims court if they don\'t pay. Updated all server programs and no improvement... Stupid. Some areas have poor or no signal and this app won\'t work on its own during those times. Me and the guys sometimes have to power cycle the entire phone because the app won\'t work (rare but happens). When entering equipment, they make you enter area served, filter and belt info on a seperate screen for some unknown reason and the button to this is extremely close to the big \"save\" button so instead you save it. This extra step makes entering equipment tedious and time consuming instead of quick as saving takes a long time in areas without LTE service. Why the extra screen? LOOOONG time.  We use Thunderbolt or Galaxy Nexus. Other than that, the app is great ;-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very poor  needs more work.
reviews.comment: Have to constantly uninstall and re-install to capture sihnature. Android operating system please fix bug this app would get 5 stars if I didn\'t have to redo all the time. Notification of new call would also be nice.wish I could set my rating to -1 star the app has not improved.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Esc
reviews.comment: Esc sux azz.....always crashing. Totally sucks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Steam coming out
reviews.comment: Adding notes. And someones calls if u answer your retyping your notes.  Or even you finish and submit pray you dont get a network error if u get 3 in a row. Yep you guessed it your retyping your notes....  So how about an auto save feature...
reviews.author: A Google User
